dataList.dlg: Tell me your destination, and I'll guide you there.
There are many things I am unable to comprehend, and those who are late to work are one of them. I believe timely arrival is a basic requirement for an employee to meet.
I often expose myself to sunlight at this hour. It may be attributed to the fact that the nature of my occupation prevented me from seeing it frequently.
Few people enjoy conversing with me. That would make you a peculiar one.
I am familiar with dead bodies. Familiarity does not assure pleasantness, however.
Don Quixote says she is proud to have joined W Corp. I found that rather curious.
If you're ever taking a WARP train, you may let me know. I'll personally collect your pieces.
If it is actually that important to empathize with others... They should have stated so in company rules.
W Corp. saw particularly many resignations. The quitting employees always had copious amounts of tears and saliva on their faces. I did not make an active effort to comprehend their behavior.
Do make sure to return in time.
Promotions... I am used to.
Understood, I'll get you to the destination.
To our destination.
You certainly are a peculiar individual.
Removing obstacles.
I am not particularly amused.
Hmpfh!
I won't have to collect these remains.
I'll collect their remains later.
I merely followed the procedures.
This was not in the procedures.
The corpses here are more durable than what I work with.
All of them have been segmented into adequate pieces.
It's a necessary step for familiarization.
